title: FS 2 T206 Willets Red and Orange Variations Both SGC 40
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: FS 2 T206 Willets Red and Orange Variations Both SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have these 2 SGC 40 graded Willets for sale. One has an orange background; one a rarer red background.

If you want just the red background its $49.50.
If you want just the orange background its $39.50

By both for[STRIKE] $89.50[/STRIKE] Correction $79.50

Shipping: Free


Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.
First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card(s).

Thanks for looking,

Joe

What if I want to purchase both, but do not want to pay more by doing so?  Can I buy them individually and save the .50? :D

Joe, good luck with the sale!

[quote name="freakhappy" post=1401944]What if I want to purchase both, but do not want to pay more by doing so?  Can I buy them individually and save the .50? :D

Joe, good luck with the sale![/QUOTE]



Lolzzzzzzzzzz:)

Good eye.

I was an English teacher. Never was good at math. I corrected the "buy both price" to reflect my original intention to give a discount.

Best regards,

Joe
